snippet: The killer, Jimmy Humphrey, did not want to start a family with the victim, Linda Anderson, who was pregnant, the district attorney said.
abstract: Jimmy Humphrey is sentenced to 50 years to life in prison after being convicted of strangling his pregnant girlfriend Linda Anderson and killing her 2-year-old son in fire he set at her Queens apartment; testified that he knew Anderson was pregnant and did not want to start a family with her.
lead_paragraph: The killer, Jimmy Humphrey, did not want to start a family with the victim, Linda Anderson, who was pregnant, the district attorney said.

headline.seo: Jimmy Humphrey Gets 50 Years for Linda Anderson’s Murder
headline.main: Killer of Girlfriend and Her Son Is Sentenced to 50 Years to Life
headline.print_headline: Killer of Girlfriend and Her Son Is Sentenced to 50 Years to Life
